body:
On Sunday I rebased against master again to catch the changes Osmose made and fixed all the conflicts, so hopefully this is in a good place to work off of. 

I also spent a bunch of time refactoring the gargantuan mess of code I had into something a lot less crazy using a container. There is some refactoring I was hoping to get done on the RecipeForm to clean up the messy code there, that I didn't manage to get around to.

body_html:
On Sunday I rebased against master again to catch the changes Osmose made and fixed all the conflicts, so hopefully this is in a good place to work off of.

I also spent a bunch of time refactoring the gargantuan mess of code I had into something a lot less crazy using a container. There is some refactoring I was hoping to get done on the RecipeForm to clean up the messy code there, that I didn't manage to get around to.
